title: 'Battle of the titans' in Malaysia's election
text:
'Battle of the titans' in Malaysia's election 12:17pm BST - 02:02
Malaysia's general election on Wednesday will be an extraordinary contest, pitting the 92-year-old former authoritarian leader, Mahathir Mohamad, against the incumbent prime minister, Najib Razak, who has been mired in a multi-billion-dollar scandal.
